Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Service Delayed near Addison
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Addison due to signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are standing near Addison due to signal problems.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
